product_name: NYX Professional MakeupShine Loud Vegan High Shine Long-Lasting Liquid Lipstick
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackShine Loud & leave no trace with NYX Professional Makeup Shine Loud Long Lasting Lip Color! Zero color transfer high shine lip color with up to 16 hr wear!
details: DetailsBenefitsLongwear high shine vegan lip colorUp to 16HR wear long lasting lip, zero color transfer, no smudge, no bleed, no fade: you can kiss, drink, hair flip & even wear it under your maskThis 2 step technology delivers comfortable 1 swipe bold color, with an ultra-glossy, non-sticky finishSimply pair the ultra-pigmented liquid lipstick base coat, with the lip gloss top coat for the loudest shine you've ever seenAvailable in many loud lip shadesVegan formula (no animal-derived ingredient or by-product)Cruelty freeKey IngredientsInfused with Vitamin E derivative & lip loving oils including macadamia seed oil, coriander fruit oil, jojoba seed oil, apricot kernel oil & passion fruit seed oilItem 2565892How To UseApply base coat to bare lips. Wait 90 seconds to dry. Lock in pigment with glossy top coat. Result: High shine color with 16h, zero color transfer wear.IngredientsBase Coat: Isododecane, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Nylon-611/Dimethicone Copolymer, Disteardimonium Hectorite, Lauroyl Lysine, Macadamia Ternifolia Seed Oil, Coriandrum Sativum Fruit Oil / Coriander Fruit Oil, Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil / Jojoba Seed Oil, Prunus Armeniaca Kernel Oil / Apricot Kernel Oil, Passiflora Edulis Seed Oil, C30-45 Alkyldimethylsilyl Polypropylsilsesquioxane, Sodium Hyaluronate, Silica, Alumina, Aluminum Hydroxide, Propylene Carbonate, Parfum / Fragrance, Benzyl Alcohol. May Contain: CI 15850 / Red 7, CI 15985 / Yellow 6 Lake, CI 45380 / Red 22 Lake, CI 45410 / Red 28 Lake, CI 77491, CI 77492, CI 77499 / Iron Oxides, CI 77891 / Titanium Dioxide, Mica, CI 19140 / Yellow 5 Lake, CI 42090 / Blue 1 Lake.Top Coat: Dimethicone, Trimethylsiloxysilicate, Tocopheryl Acetate.
how_to_use: Apply base coat to bare lips. Wait 90 seconds to dry. Lock in pigment with glossy top coat. Result: High shine color with 16h, zero color transfer wear.
ingredients: Coriandrum Sativum Fruit Oil / Coriander Fruit Oil
Simmondsia Chinensis Seed Oil / Jojoba Seed Oil
Prunus Armeniaca Kernel Oil / Apricot Kernel Oil

reviews.headline: Can't life without it ðŸ’‹
reviews.comments: The only lips I ever wear thanks ULTA BEST COLOR EVER!!!'n

reviews.headline: the best ðŸ¤©
reviews.comments: Excellent durability, comfort and price. I dare say it's better than Urban Decay and Anastasia.

reviews.headline: love it
reviews.comments: Have purchased this item several times and will continue to do so

reviews.headline: Stayed put and transfer proof
reviews.comments: I wore this lipstick to a concert where I was singing, sweating, and drinking. It stayed put for over six hours without reapplying! It didn't even budge for the pretzel after the show. I had to work to remove it that night because it was determined to stay on. The color payoff was great and I like the applicator. I want to try other colors now!

reviews.headline: Transfer-proof and lasts FOREVER
reviews.comments:
Just like the title says, this lipstick is basically transfer-proof and lasts through basically anything. This lipstick will last through swimming, eating oily foods, and an entire day of sweating in summer heat without moving even a little bit. Sometimes I'll forget to take it off at night and just touch it up in the morning and keep wearing it. I ate oily food truck tacos in this lipstick and expected the oil to completely obliterate this lipstick â€” because usually even my high end "long lasting" lipsticks can't withstand food truck tacos â€” but it was still PRISTINE after. I'm super impressed with the formula for this product. 

The "Shake Things Up" grape color is also my absolute FAVORITE lipstick color EVER. I love the versatility of that perfect, warm purple because it's subtle enough to wear to the office but edgy enough to wear to the goth club. It's been the first liquid lipstick I have ever used completely through because I wear it almost every day. 

Unfortunately, I accidentally bought the "Make It Work" plum color instead of "Shake Things Up" grape color when I went to replace it because I was shopping elsewhere and didn't realize that the color I had bought originally was an Ulta exclusive. The "Make It Work" color is very pretty, but it's more of a dark rose than a plum, so I was a bit disappointed when I saw it in person. And even then, my only real complaint with "Shake Things Up" is that I feel like calling it "plum" is a little misleading.

Formula-wise, though? AMAZING. My favorite lipstick of all time. I plan to replace my "Shake Things Up" as well as get the blue and green colors at some point in the future, and I hope at some point Nyx decides to add a black in this formula because I desperately need a black lipstick that has this kind of staying power.

reviews.headline: All day color
reviews.comments: I have nultiple shades in NYX's long lasting lipstick. This is my favorite deep wine shade. Lasts throuhour the.day with minimal touchups. Hands down my daily go to lipstick.

reviews.headline: No good
reviews.comments: Lipsticks were all open and one stick was bent

reviews.headline: Good product
reviews.comments: This product actually does what it says...it stays on for a long time.

reviews.headline: I did not like it but it was a cute red
reviews.comments: Very sticky and did not last. I had to apply it multiple times

reviews.headline: NYX Professional Long Lasting Liquid Lipstick
reviews.comments: This is definitely long wear! I love the color too. I put some on at, 10:30pm to see how it lasted. I woke with pretty lips that looked like I had just put it on. My new favorite

reviews.headline: Long lasting
reviews.comments: It really does last longer than any other product I've tried

reviews.headline: Tried and True - My new Holy Grail
reviews.comments: This product does exactly what it claims - stays PUT! I applied it before going to a party. While there, I snacked on pizza and cake - and after leaving the party and checking the mirror, this lipstick was still in place. I was absolutely shocked. I purchased only one color just to test it out, but I am back to pick up all of the other colors.

reviews.headline: LOVE IT
reviews.comments:
Super comfortable! Wear it all day and i 
 use it as a lip liner, and it doesnt fall off

reviews.headline: Nice lipstick
reviews.comments: I think its a pretty lipstick that lasts all day and leaves a nice color. One con i would say though is that i wish there was less gloss and more lipstick

reviews.headline: Found my Holy Grail
reviews.comments: I've been looking for a long-wear lipstick. I'm getting old and my lips are shrinking (NO!) so I over line but when lipstick fades, I'm back to thinning lips. This lipstick is what I've been looking for! Beautiful flattering color. And lasted ALL day, even through eating! The gloss keeps it moisturized( just a dab), so comfortable to wear. I felt pretty all day! Can not recommend enough!

reviews.headline: I just STAYED. Please read this review
reviews.comments: So, my 4 your old son and I have a little tradition. When I put on makeup, he will go through my drawer and choose out an item of makeup to draw a heart on the back of his hand. He normally chooses a colored eyeliner, but this time he chose the red Shine Loud long lasting lip color. We put it on Friday morning, and i kind you not that this thing hadn't faded on his hand until Sunday morning. Inbetween we went on 2-8hour car rides, washed/sanitized his hands about a thousand times, and even swam in a chlorine pool for 2 hours. Yeah, I would recommend it.

reviews.headline: I would buy this product again and again
reviews.comments: This is the first lipstick I've tried that really lasts.  It does not disappear within an hour of putting it on.

reviews.headline: Amazing lip stain
reviews.comments: This lip stain is awesome. It stays on all day and looks incredible.

reviews.headline: Love the color
reviews.comments: Love the color but the clear is rather sticky so i use my own sparkly clear gloss..

reviews.headline: Overnight Hero Indeed!
reviews.comments:
I had been searching for a lipstick color ever since Milk discontiued their "low key" lipstickâ€¦this liquid lipstick in "overnight hero" is it! 

Not only is the color perfect but the color stays on all day and isnt drying at all as long as you use the gloss as well. I will be trying other colors!

media.headline: I would absolutely buy this again

faceoff_positive.comments: I was fortunate to nab tubes of Goal Getter and Boundary Pusher when they were in stock.  Yay, two for two in the "love the color" column. Goal Getter is a gorgeous deep rich almost-maroon, and will be my go-to. Boundary Pusher, as seen in the attached picture, is a warm, subtle, brown. They last as promised; I'd say they are comparable to the big-name pioneer in all-day two-coat lip color, though somehow easier to remove at the end of the day. NYX, you hit it out of the ballpark with Shine Loud!
faceoff_positive.headline: Wonderful color, coverage and staying power

faceoff_negative.comments: Just as the title says, if I could give this less than one star I would. Product applies fine, the applicator is actually nice and precise but that's where the good stops. After only 4 hours of wear and a non-oily meal, the lipstick starts to flake all over the place. Forget about the inside of your lips staying in place ha no that quickly ends up transferred onto teeth instead. The gloss is fine and covers the uncomfortable, spackle-like sticky texture of the lipstick after it "dries" and even holds up for that initial, internet-worthy hand kiss to prove it's not going anywhere (ya try a few hours later). Wasn't even doing anything which involved friction to my lips or oil to break down the formula. Overall, extremely disappointed I wanted to like this product so bad. The photos below are after blotting 4 hours after applicationâ€¦yuck.
faceoff_negative.headline: If I could give this less than a star I would
